description: Plugins help make Acrobat and Reader more versatile and customizable for professional and personal users and their specific workflows. However, you need to ensure that the plugins are compatible with your version of Acrobat or Reader since compatibility issues have arisen due to software updates and advancing system architecture. For example, older versions of Acrobat and Reader use API files for plugins, whereas more recent versions of the programs typically use .ACROPLUGIN files.
